You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesP P] > &pfr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Pfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D513.
  * `&pfr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D52D.
